1: <pb/><t>Ix tac'vixi vin̈aj Job chi' icha tic:</t>
2: <t>Vojtac val sic'lab'il to icha chi' yaji. Palta, ¿toc ay junoc on̈ syal calanoch co b'a vach'il d'a yichan̈ Dios?</t>
3: <t>Q'uinaloc sco telaj co b'a yed'oc, malaj am junoc tas syal co pacan d'ay d'a miloc tas sc'anb'ej d'ayon̈.</t>
4: <t>A Dios te nivan sjelanil yed' spoder. Q'uinaloc sco tec'b'ej co b'a d'a yichan̈, ¿tocval stechaj cuuj?</t>
5: <t>A yuj yoval sc'ol Dios tz'ib'xiq'ue lum nivac vitz, tz'el lum c'acap, malaj mach ojtannac tato tzuji juntzan̈ chi'.</t>
6: <t>Ayic stzicub'tan̈an lum luum tic d'a yed'tal, tz'ib'xi sb'achnub'al luum.</t>
7: <t>A Dios chi' syal yalan d'a c'u to max javilaj, syalanpax d'a q'uen c'anal to max yac'laj yoc q'ueen.</t>
8: <t>Malaj junoc mach ix colvaj yed'oc ayic ix yac'anb'at jen̈an satchaan̈. An̈eja' pax stec'anem sat a' mar yic sq'ue chulnaj a'.</t>
9: <t>A' ix b'oan juntzan̈ q'uen c'anal scuch nivan Osa, q'uen Oxd'ilan̈, q'uen Mootz yed' juntzan̈xo q'uen yaman yaji scheclaj d'a stojolal sur.</t>
10: <t>Man̈xo b'ischajb'enoc tastac satub'tac sc'ulej. A juntzan̈ chi' malaj junoc mach syal snachajel yuuj.</t>
11: <t>Tato tz'ec' Dios d'a co tz'ey, max yal-laj quilani. Tato tz'ec' d'a chi' ¿toc snachajel vuuj?</t>
12: <t>Tato ay tas syiq'uec' d'a junoc mach, ¿mach syal scachanoch vaan? ¿mach syal sc'anb'an d'ay tas sc'ulej?</t>
13: <t>Tato scot yoval sc'ol Dios chi', max yal yoch vaan d'a ichn̈ej ta'. A eb' ayoch yed' Rahab ol can eb' d'a yalan̈ yuuj.</t>
14: <t>Yuj chi', ¿tas lolonel syal valani yic tzin pacan d'a Dios?</t>
15: <t>Vach'chom malaj in mul, palta max yal-laj in tac'vi d'ay. In juezal yaji, tzin c'anan yoq'uelc'olal d'ayin.</t>
16: <t>Q'uinaloc svavtej Dios chi' b'aj tzin ch'olb'itaji, vach'chom sc'ochi, palta ¿tocval ol scha yab' tas svala'?</t>
17: <t>Axo tz'aji, tzam in yac' lajvoc yed' junoc ic'n̈ab' te ov, svach' nivtaj in yaelal tic d'a ichn̈ej ta'.</t>
18: <t>Maxtzac xom yal vic'an vip junoc rato. Tzam te vach' nivtaj in yaelal tic yuuj.</t>
19: <t>Q'uinaloc svac' pural Dios chi' yic sb'oan icha tzin nib'ej, max yal-laj yujto aton Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil. Q'uinaloc svavtej d'a yichan̈ eb' juez, ¿mach syal yac'an pural sc'ochi?</t>
20: <t>Q'uinaloc svala' te vach' in, axo in lolonel sch'oxaneli to ay in paltail. Q'uinaloc svala' to malaj jab'oc in paltail chi', axom Dios tz'alani to man̈ yeloc.</t>
21: <t>Vach'chom a in tic malaj in mul, palta malaj velc'och d'a yol in sat, maxtzac yal in c'ol pitzan in.</t>
22: <t>A in naani, lajanxon̈ej smasanil. A Dios chi' satanel eb' ay smul yed' eb' malaj smul.</t>
23: <t>Q'uinaloc sjavi chamel d'a yib'an̈ masanil anima, malaj tas sna Dios chi' ayic slajviel anima malaj smul.</t>
24: <t>Scan jun yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic d'a yol sc'ab' eb' chuc yuuj, smacchaj sat eb' juez yuuj. Tato man̈oc Dios sc'ulani, ¿mach sc'ulan jun?</t>
25: <t>Elan̈chamel tz'ec'b'at in q'uinal, malaj jab'oc tzalajc'olal svila'.</t>
26: <t>Lajan val sb'ey in q'uinal tic icha sb'ey junoc te' balso d'a sat a a', aton te' b'ob'il yed' te' papiro. Lajan pax icha sb'at xumumoc noc' ch'acb'a yic syaman schib'ej noc'.</t>
27: <t>Q'uinaloc sb'atcan in yaelal tic satc'olal vuuj, tzalajc'olal am tzin ajcani.</t>
28: <t>Palta masanil in yaelal tic ton̈ej tzin somchajel yuuj, yujto vojtac to max in yal Dios vach'il.</t>
29: <t>Tato ay in mul yalani, nab'an̈ej svac' vip valani to vach' in.</t>
30: <t>Vach'chom tzin b'ic in c'ab' yed' noc' xapon, ma yed' yal taan̈,</t>
31: <t>palta a Dios tzin yac'n̈ejem d'a scal a a' soc'omtac, axo in pichul sq'uixvi vuuj.</t>
32: <t>Max yal in pacan in b'a d'a Dios icha d'a junoc comon anima. Max yal valani to syal in b'at yed'oc d'a yichan̈ eb' juez.</t>
33: <t>Comonoc ay junoc mach syal yac'an vil-laj in b'a yed'oc, syalan tas tzon̈ aj co chavan̈il.</t>
34: <t>Octom ay junoc mach syal yalan d'ay yic tz'och vaan yac'anoch in yaelal, tz'och vaan in xib'tani.</t>
35: <t>Tato icha chi', maxtzac am in xiv in loloni, yujto malaj in mul icha eyalan tic.</t>
